Articles.Content:
• Here is a list of challenges for you to try to complete! Starting with one the challenges get harder the farther you go in my opinion. Rules: [list type=decimal]
          [list type=decimal]
          [li]Use only stock parts[/li]
          [li]No modding or changing config files[/li]
          [li]No copyrighting other people designs, Keep it creative(use your own designs)[/li]
          [li]Have fun! Good Luck![/li]

NO picture it didn\'t happen!

Here are your challenges!

[list type=decimal]

[li]Make the smallest craft you can to get into an orbit![/li][li]

[


  • [li]Get your craft into a Kerbostationary orbit[/li]
    [li]Land on the moon[/li]
    [li]Perform an orbital redezvous[/li]
    [li]Drive a Moon [glow=green,2,300]rover[/glow] on the moon[/li]
    [li]Perform an eva in orbit[/li]
    [li]Perform an eva on the moon[/li]
    [li]Land on minnmus[/li]
    [li]Perform an eva on minnmus[/li]
    [li]Orbit the [glow=red,2,300]sun[/glow][/li]

Good Luck Have fun! Post pictures and videos here to get judged! Judging ends never! More Challenges comming soon!

[move]Leader Board! Leader Board! Leader Board! Leader Board! Leader Board! Leader Board! Leader Board![/move]

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

1.XiXLLAMAXiX

2.

3.

4.

5.

6.

7.

8.

9.

10.

Make a space-worthy craft: several times here

Get your craft into a Kerbostationary orbit: Not quite

Land on the moon: if you count crashing, then yes

Orbit the moon: nope

Drive a Moon rover on the moon: nope

Perform an eva in orbit: yes, and go between debris several KM apart

Perform an eva on the moon: nope

Do 2-4,6 for minnmus: nope

Orbit the sun: accidentally, while trying to get to the moon
NoNONONO! You have to have some proff of these challenges ex: a picture

Make a space-worthy craft: several times here

Get your craft into a Kerbostationary orbit: Not quite

Land on the moon: if you count crashing, then yes

Orbit the moon: nope

Drive a Moon rover on the moon: nope

Perform an eva in orbit: yes, and go between debris several KM apart

Perform an eva on the moon: nope

Do 2-4,6 for minnmus: nope

Orbit the sun: accidentally, while trying to get to the moon

you need to have some proof, and crashing doesn\'t count!

For clarification, the largest craft wins? I feel like it would be more of a challenge to make it so that smallest craft wins. I can get a big-a$$ rocket to the moon and back all day every day, but getting a smaller craft to do the same thing is more difficult.

Make a space-worthy craft: many times

Get your craft into a Kerbostationary orbit: haven\'t tried yet, but should just be a matter of figuring out how high up Kerostationary is, and then launching my orbiter

Land on the moon: many times. I can get multiple craft to land next to each other too

Orbit the moon: many times. orbiting the moon is part of my munar landing procedure.

Drive a Moon rover on the moon: working on it. My rover launch vehicle keeps getting attacked by a space kraken (randomly breaking apart)

Perform an eva in orbit: when my rover craft broke up, I had to rescue the poor pilot. He had to EVA into the recovery vehicle. (By the way, you should add orbital rendezvous to your challenge list, because that is a challenge =P)

Perform an eva on the moon: yup!

Do 2-4,6 for minnmus: I\'m not sure what this means

Orbit the sun: not yet...

I\'ll get some pics up later... I didn\'t take any while I was doing this =P

For clarification, the largest craft wins? I feel like it would be more of a challenge to make it so that smallest craft wins. I can get a big-a$$ rocket to the moon and back all day every day, but getting a smaller craft to do the same thing is more difficult.

Make a space-worthy craft: many times

Get your craft into a Kerbostationary orbit: haven\'t tried yet, but should just be a matter of figuring out how high up Kerostationary is, and then launching my orbiter

Land on the moon: many times. I can get multiple craft to land next to each other too

Orbit the moon: many times. orbiting the moon is part of my munar landing procedure.

Drive a Moon rover on the moon: working on it. My rover launch vehicle keeps getting attacked by a space kraken (randomly breaking apart)

Perform an eva in orbit: when my rover craft broke up, I had to rescue the poor pilot. He had to EVA into the recovery vehicle. (By the way, you should add orbital rendezvous to your challenge list, because that is a challenge =P)

Perform an eva on the moon: yup!

Do 2-4,6 for minnmus: I\'m not sure what this means

Orbit the sun: not yet...

I\'ll get some pics up later... I didn\'t take any while I was doing this =P

You make a good point my friend!

Stay cool, 8)

12aven

Hello!

Since this challenge I always used MechJeb, for launches and landings for example. When I read it I thought it would be nice to try to learn to do all the maneuvers. Therefore, I send my thanks before putting my photos!!


  • [li]Make the smallest craft you can to get into an orbit![/li]

These model is 'Minimus Orbiter I'. Has 24 pieces. I create a other, 'Ultraminimus Orbiter I' with only 5 pieces, but this model like me more. ;D If you wont I can show you.

http://imgur.com/a/VObOu#1

'Minimus Orbiter I' climbing.

http://imgur.com/a/VObOu#2

'Minimus Orbiter I' in orbit.

http://imgur.com/a/VObOu#3

'Minimus Orbiter I' in descent trayectory. If is possible, I always like attemp comeback to home.

http://imgur.com/a/VObOu#4

'Minimus Orbiter I', final phase. Parachuting!!

Happy end! (EVA al Kerbin).

  • [li]Get your craft into a Kerbostationary orbit[/li]

I think it says 'Keostationary orbit', but I think it\'s better 'Kerbinostationary orbit'.
Well, I don\'t know is the most right thing. I think we can use abbreviation 'Kst'...


'Hypatia Kst Orbiter I', 10 pieces, very cute! It\'s the base of other ships!
http://imgur.com/a/VObOu#7
'Hypatia Kst Orbiter I' in launch pad.


'Hypatia Kst Orbiter I' in Kst orbit. It\'s easy!! In this image you can see the apoapsis altitude, periapsis altitude and ship altitude because is a collage meke with three consecutuve images. I promise it isn\'t a fake!! 8)


Another happy end!!

  • [li]Land on the moon[/li]

Ok!! Hypatia model its improved! There is 'Hypatia Munar Lander I'.

http://imgur.com/a/VObOu#11

'Hypatia Munar Lander I' climbing.

http://imgur.com/a/VObOu#12

'Hypatia Munar Lander I' in route to Mun.

Landed at Mun!

  • [li]Perform an orbital re[glow=red,2,300]n[/glow]dezvous[/li]

For the moment, I can\'t make orbital approximations without MechJeb technologies.
After this message, I wont attemp it.
  • [li]Drive a Moon rover on the moon. And I think ever: Perform an eva on the moon[/li]

Second improvement of Hypatia model. More powerful!!

http://imgur.com/a/VObOu#15

'Hypatia Munar Rover I' in second stage, when the first tanks are decoupled. Whith this stage I can arrive to Mun or Minmus if i wont!!

http://imgur.com/a/VObOu#16

'Hypatia Munar Rover I' in route to Mun.

http://imgur.com/a/VObOu#17

'Hypatia Munar Rover I' preparing deburning.

http://imgur.com/a/VObOu#18

Landed at a crater! Look around!!

In this image you can see another ship, 'Hermes Monolith Pointer I', Yeah!

http://imgur.com/a/VObOu#21

'Rovering' to the Monolith.

http://imgur.com/a/VObOu#22

Initiating EVA looking the Monolith!!

Finally!!

  • [li]Perform an eva in orbit[/li]

It\'s easy!! I will do so in an orbital rendezvous attempt. Too cool!!
  • [li]In the same mission I can Land on minnmus; Perform an eva on minnmus; Orbit the sun[/li]

Yes!! with Hypatia lander model, without changes. 'Hypatia Minmus Lander I'.

I one kick!!! It\'s easy!!

http://imgur.com/a/VObOu#26

'Hypatia Minmus Lander I' orbiting Minmus.

Decoupling the big tank at Minmus orbit!!

http://imgur.com/a/VObOu#28

http://imgur.com/a/VObOu#29

'Hermes 104 Mimnus I' it\'s my longest mission because is the second flight with KSP v.0.16. Loot at the name!! Also I was wrong!!

EVA in Minmus. Nothing else!! Well, I don\'t know if there Easter eggs...

http://imgur.com/a/VObOu#31

http://imgur.com/a/VObOu#32

Well, Minmus gravity it\'s very small, so with a little boost you can scape and...

Sun orbit achived!!! It\'s a dangerous situation. If I mistake now, it\'s very difficult to come back because I don\'t have enough engine power.

Compares the distance when I got the Sun orbit with the distance when I did a re-entry trajectory!!

http://imgur.com/a/VObOu#35

Re-entry it\'s easy between 30 km and 40 km. The friction with the atmosphere slows you down.

Another happy end!!

Ciao!!

http://imgur.com/a/VObOu/all#0

^This guy wins^

And today I learned that I\'m too lazy to get pictures =P
How is there a leaderboard without a criterium for ranking entries?
